name: Project Expansion
description:
In this game, you control a drone trying to build chairs by automating a factory using conveyors. You shall harvest 3 types of ressources, two of which being different each game, the last being coal.

This game has been made as a school project with the godot engine and still has some bugs, the two currently known are that a curved conveyor needs straight ones on each side to work and that in some cases, ressources might derail of the conveyors.
